100      Arguments.of(GEOMETRY, "POLYGON ((35 10, 45 45, 15 40, 10 20, 35 10),(20 30, 30 20, 35 35, 20 30))", false, false, false), // Anticlockwise outer, anticlockwise inner
101      Arguments.of(GEOMETRY, "MULTIPOLYGON (((30 10, 40 40, 20 40, 10 20, 30 10)),((120 30, 130 20, 135 35, 120 30)))", true, false, false),

170      Arguments.of(GEO_DISTANCE, "200,90,100m", false, false, false),
171      Arguments.of(GEO_DISTANCE, "200", false, false, false),
172      Arguments.of(GEO_DISTANCE, "30,90,277", true, false, false),
173      Arguments.of(DISTANCE_FROM_CENTROID_IN_METERS, "100", true, false, false),
174      Arguments.of(DISTANCE_FROM_CENTROID_IN_METERS, "100,*", true, true, false),
175      Arguments.of(DISTANCE_FROM_CENTROID_IN_METERS, "*,277", true, true, false)
176    );
177  }
178
179  @ParameterizedTest
180  @MethodSource("data")
181  public void testValidateFine(SearchParameter parameter, String arg, boolean valid, boolean numericRange, boolean dateRange) {
182    try {
183      SearchTypeValidator.validate(parameter, arg);
184      if (!valid) {
185        fail(arg + " supposed to be an invalid value for parameter " + parameter);
186      }
187    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
188      if (valid) {
189        fail(arg + " supposed to be a valid value for parameter " + parameter + " " + e.getMessage());
190      }
191    }
192
193    // test isNumericRange
194    assertEquals(numericRange, SearchTypeValidator.isNumericRange(arg), "Wrong isNumericRange parsing of value " + arg);
195
196    // test isDateRange
197    assertEquals(dateRange, SearchTypeValidator.isDateRange(arg), "Wrong isDateRange parsing of value " + arg);
198  }
199
200  /**
201   * Mock implementation of SearchParameter that used a {@link Temporal}.
202   */
203  private enum SearchLocalDateTime implements SearchParameter {
204    SEARCH_LOCAL_DATE_TIME;
205    @Override
206    public Class<?> type() {
207      return LocalDateTime.class;
208    }
209  }
210}
